data.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
data.subtitle: Thinslices
data.description: At Thinslices, I develop frontend features using TypeScript, React, and Next.js, delivering scalable solutions for both enterprise and consumer applications. I work on automating CI/CD pipelines to improve release speed and developer experience, while leveraging Node.js and AWS services to support growing product demands. I also document UI components with Storybook to enhance design consistency and mentor junior developers, translating technical work into clear business value during demos.

data.title: Frontend Engineer
data.subtitle: Endava
data.description: At Endava, I built responsive, testable web interfaces using React, Jest, and Enzyme, integrating real-time WebSocket updates to improve user experience. I developed a full-stack demo platform independently and contributed to team growth by conducting technical interviews for JavaScript interns.
